name: Mekafusion #15 MF05-TITAN-GUARD
description:
Model: MF05-TITAN-GUARD ( Mekanic Fusion no.5 - TITAN GUARDIAN )
Series: BLADE

Fusions:
BS08-RAZOR ( Base Mekanoid no. 8 - RAZOR )
MW-BROADSWORD ( Meta Weapon - HEAVY BROADSWORD )
MG-TITAN-ARMOR-V1 (Meta Gear - TITAN ARMOR version 1)

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Incredible Strength
• Weapon: HEAVY BROADSWORD
• Perks: Heavy damage and Heavy-duty armor

A Mekanic fusion between Base model and Meta Gear to form Mekafusion in BLADE series. A Titan Guardian with its unique AI to use to wield a Heavy Broadsword that smites a powerful piercing blow and wearing Heavy-duty armor.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Artwork is created in image 4000x4000 pixel HD resolution to satisfy its quality into an iconic figure.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
